column4: should I add a 32 big repo for installing 32 big dependencies (on a 64 bit install)
nope. Ubuntu's package manager doesn't support mixing multiple architectures like that

perhaps you mean "dependencies" in a different way from me, but all packages in the 64-bit repository depend on other 64-bit packages. the vast, vast majority of the Ubuntu archive is built for both 64-bit and 32-bit.
